snippet: The retailer is grappling with low customer confidence after it cut so many workers that it cannot stock its shelves properly, according to some employees and industry analysts.
abstract: Walmart is said to have cut so many employees that it no longer has enough workers to stock its shelves properly; nation's largest retailer and grocer is grappling with low customer confidence in its produce and poor quality; is addressing concerns with measures including new inventory system and signs that will help employees keep track of freshness.
lead_paragraph: The retailer is grappling with low customer confidence after it cut so many workers that it cannot stock its shelves properly, according to some employees and industry analysts.

headline.seo: Walmart Strains to Keep Grocery Aisles Stocked
headline.main: Walmart Strains to Keep Aisles Stocked Fresh
headline.print_headline: Walmart Strains To Keep Aisles Stocked Fresh
